name: Honor Squad
description:
The game idea

Reading about WW2 I found really interesting how anti-aircraft guns worked. It's amazing how much understanding and calculation a pilot needed to avoid being hit at any height from the ground, and all done manually.

The gameplay

You're trying to survive the first Kms on enemy territory before getting to your main objective [in a future update]. 

You only have 4 bombs so use them wisely. Each bullet the enemy waste trying to kill you and each enemy killed with your bombs will increase your Honor Score. Be remembered as the hero you are!

Some clues...

The anti-aircraft guns will try to predict your behavior based on the direction and speed you had when you appeared on their radar. The "beeps" indicate their count down to start shooting at you.

That means that you must continuously change direction. Pay attention to the beeps. The shots will be spread a little because the enemy knows you have great evasive skills.

Good luck!
